item.title: Autotalker typesend things
item.dc:creator: @elfonso elfonso
item.description:
@elfonso wrote:

[scar]program autotalker;

const

message1=(‘hi people!!’); //type what you want him to say this is a example

message2=(‘auto talking please wait till trade hit ctrl+alt+s to stop’);

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(3000) // how many seconds do you want him to say it each time
SendKeys(message1 + Chr(13)) // change uptop to say something diffrent
wait(1000)
end;

begin
Writeln(Message2);
repeat
autotalk;
until(false)
end.[/scar]
[/quote]

Bullzeye you made a mistake, fixed it

Junkj, how could you not know something this simple, you have to press enter to say something.

Read full topic

wait(3000) // how many seconds do you want him to say it each time

item.title: Autotalker typesend things
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

You know you could have just posted in the topic you already made? [scar]program autotalker;

const

message1=(‘hi people!!’); //type what you want him to say this is a example

message2=(‘auto talking please wait till trade hit ctrl+alt+s to stop’);

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(3000) // how many seconds do you want him to say it each time
SendKeys(message1 + Chr(13)) // change uptop to say something diffrent
wait(1000)
SendKeys(message2 + Chr(13))
end;

begin
repeat
autotalk;
until(false)
end.[/scar] Ok I fixed it.

item.title: Autotalker typesend things
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

i need help with my script it types the words but it never enters the word into runescape it over flows the type bar.i need help with my script, if anyone is nice enough that they can help me please do.

junkj
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 06:16:11 PM[/size][hr][quote=“junkj”]Thanks for not posting and looking at my unfinished script i really thank you all![/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 06:55:36 PM[/size][hr][glow=pink[font=Verdana][/font],2,300][/glow]

Now im going to post my script so you can look at it all and you dont need to download it would be alot easier

[scar]program autotalker;

const

message1=(‘hi people!!’); //type what you want him to say this is a example

message2=(‘auto talking please wait till trade hit ctrl+alt+s to stop’);

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(3000) // how many seconds do you want him to say it each time
SendKeys(message1) // change uptop to say something diffrent
wait(1000)
Writeln(message2)
end;

begin
repeat
autotalk;
until(false)
end[/scar]
